metadata.Title: CVE-2017-6820 on Ubuntu 21.10 (impish) - medium.
metadata.Description:
rcube_utils.php in Roundcube before 1.1.8 and 1.2.x before 1.2.4 is susceptible to a cross-site scripting vulnerability via a crafted Cascading Style Sheets (CSS) token sequence within an SVG element.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo ua fix CVE-2017-6820` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

roundcube - 1.3.6+dfsg.1-1
roundcube-core - 1.3.6+dfsg.1-1
roundcube-mysql - 1.3.6+dfsg.1-1
roundcube-pgsql - 1.3.6+dfsg.1-1
roundcube-plugins - 1.3.6+dfsg.1-1
roundcube-sqlite3 - 1.3.6+dfsg.1-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: roundcube package in impish, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1.3.6+dfsg.1-1').
